member.name: M:SampleService.SampleActor.#ctor(Dapr.Actors.Runtime.ActorHost)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SmokeDetectorActor
member.param: The Dapr.Actors.Runtime.ActorHost that will host this actor instance.

member.name: M:SampleService.SampleActor.OnActivateAsync
member.summary: This method is called whenever an actor is activated. An actor is activated the first time any of its methods are invoked.

member.name: M:SampleService.SampleActor.OnDeactivateAsync
member.summary: This method is called whenever an actor is deactivated after a period of inactivity.
